attributes.action: encourage the proposed application for the UK to host the 2018 World Cup so long as it is funded from the income earned by the game itself, and not by grants from the Lottery fund or the public purse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Premier League clubs being paid millions by TV, any application for the World Cup to be played in the UK at any time should be funded by Football itself, and not fall as a burden on either the public purse or the Lottery Fund, which has already been raided for the Olympic Games
